name: The Elder Scrolls III: Morrowind
notes:
Modifying keyboard controls crashes the game.
This is due to a regression in Wine dating from 2007. If you want this to be fixed, you can tell it here: https://bugs.winehq.org/show_bug.cgi?id=8854
content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Select Morrowind's Setup.exe
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Bethesda Softworks/Morrowind/Morrowind Launcher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    executable: file1
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
